title: OpenCode Remote Config Configuration
description: Configuration for the remote-config plugin that syncs skills, agents, commands, plugins, and instructions from Git repositories

$schema.description: JSON Schema reference for editor support

repositories.description: List of Git repositories to sync skills, agents, commands, plugins, and instructions from

sync.description: Sync mode: 'blocking' waits for sync before OpenCode is ready, 'background' syncs asynchronously

installMethod.description: How to install skills and plugins: 'link' creates symlinks (fast, may not work in containers), 'copy' copies files (works everywhere, uses rsync if available)

filterConfig.description: Filter configuration with include or exclude list

include.description: List of item names to include

oneOf.description: Import all except the listed items

exclude.description: List of item names to exclude

importConfig.description: Import configuration: '*' for all, or an object with include/exclude arrays

oneOf.description: Import all items from the repository

repository.description: Configuration for a single Git repository

url.description: Git URL (SSH or HTTPS). Examples: git@github.com:org/repo.git, https://github.com/org/repo.git

ref.description: Git ref to checkout (branch, tag, or commit SHA). Defaults to repository's default branch

skills.description: Skills to import. Use '*' for all, { include: [...] } for specific skills, or { exclude: [...] } to import all except listed

agents.description: Agents to import. Use '*' for all, { include: [...] } for specific agents, or { exclude: [...] } to import all except listed

commands.description: Commands (slash commands) to import. Use '*' for all, { include: [...] } for specific commands, or { exclude: [...] } to import all except listed

plugins.description: Plugins (hook files) to import. Use '*' for all, { include: [...] } for specific plugins, or { exclude: [...] } to import all except listed. Plugins must be self-contained (no local imports).

instructions.description: Instructions to import from manifest.json. Use '*' for all, { include: [...] } for specific instructions, or { exclude: [...] } to import all except listed
